title: Triumphant Lionesses squad to be honoured at Downing Street
description: England’s women’s football team will be honoured with a reception at No 10 on Monday, with deputy prime minister Angela Rayner to welcome the side
content:
England’s triumphant women’s football team will be honoured with a reception at 10 Downing Street on Monday afternoon, in celebration of the successful defence of their European title.

title: 'It destroyed my life': The drug addiction leaving users in chronic pain
description: Nicole will always remember the first time she took ketamine.
content:

title: Nurses union to reject pay deal as strike vote looms
description: The Royal College of Nursing has been holding a consultative vote on their 3.6% pay rise.
content:
The union will announce the results of its indicative vote later this week but the BBC understands it will show an "overwhelming" rejection of the deal.
The turnout is expected to be well over the 50% threshold needed for industrial action.
